EmailTemplate.name: 2024 - Dormitory - OC-00747
EmailTemplate.subject: Affordable Sleeping Quarters Building for {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello! Are you in need of cost-effective, ready-to-use sleeping quarters for your team?
BOXX Modular currently has a pre-owned dormitory building with restrooms that comfortably sleeps 7. This building is ready to be delivered for rent or sale to provide your crew with on-site accommodations.
View the building details --> 24' x 60' Used Modular Dormitory https://www.boxxmodular.com/used-modular/oc-00747/
Visit our website today to explore our complete selection of modular solutions and our team will help you find the perfect fit for your needs.
-->View used building inventory https://www.boxxmodular.com/used-modular/?sort=Name&restroom=0&areamin=0&areamax=null
--> View mobile offices selection https://www.boxxmodular.com/offices/mobile/
To connect with us for more information: --> Reply to this email
--> Request a quote on our website https://www.boxxmodular.com/quote-request/
--> Call 877-966-7839 to speak with one of our local experts
We are here to help!
